content: in this legal case a court in messina dissolved a community property and assigned specific assets to each party involved one party was given a flat in messina while the other party was given another flat the court also ordered one party to pay the other a balance of €163333 plus legal interest the case started when one party sued the other claiming that their deceased fathers estate had not been properly divided the court determined the authenticity of a handwritten document and ruled on the division of assets they also addressed the issue of the division of common property and the obligation to account for the management of the estate the court decided to divide the assets and determined the shares of each party they concluded that the assets could be divided and allocated them through a sale or assignment the court also determined that the costs should be paid by the estate the court of first instance heard the attorneys of the parties involved and issued a final judgment the parties involved were identified as pi gi sa bo and al the court declared the dissolution of the community property and assigned specific flats to each party they also ordered the payment of a balance to one party and determined that the estate should cover the costs the judgment was made on november 22nd 2016
